instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: Hi guys, I have this mac that does not turn on, green led for 1 minute and then orange. I had an absorption of 0.22 and after replacing u7100 it dropped to 0.8. but still does not start. Some idea?

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
First of all, welcome to the forum.

We need some voltages and signals from power on sequence.
Magsafe light should switch faster from green to amber (in seconds).

Post exact voltage for PPBUS_G3H and 3V3_S5/SUS, if appear.

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
PPBUS_G3H short
3V3_S5 0,59
3V3_sus 0
sorry 2 second from green at amber

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
Post exact resistance to ground at PPBUS_G3H (ohm scale).
Allow 10-15s after power is removed, before measure ohm scale.

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 72188, member: 682"]
PPBUS_G3H
[/QUOTE]
0.4

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
Do you mean 0.4 ohm (400 miliohm)?
That is pure short.
Check if you get same value in any big coil, from secondary supplies.

0.4 in diode mode is totally different thing...

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: I said BIG COILS; like L7310, L7430, L9330, etc...

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: Do you get 0.3 ohm to ground on all these coils?

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: You put the tips on the sides

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: yes put the  tips on the sides

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: Do you mean measured between coil pads???

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: yes

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
What do you expect then, apart of pure short?

"Post exact resistance to ground"
Was not this clear enough?

Please post again all values; measure between corresponding coil and ground!

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
Then is safe to inject voltage, if short remains on PPBUS_G3H.
Start with 1V and go high slowly, if needed.
Set first the lab PSU amp limit to max.
Probably a big cap will heat on PPBUS_G3H.

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: my power supply reaches a maximum of 5A but does not heat anything

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
Lower the voltage, to keep current bellow 5A.
For such pure short (0.3 ohm) you need powerfull PSU.
20A models posted on the forum.

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: I have seen several on the forum. Could you recommend me a specific model?

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: I use 24V/20A, good enough.

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on

threads.message: Looks nice, but you can get cheap one, for less than 50 bucks on Aliexpress.

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
Hi today I got the PSU
I start from 1 V but how many A?

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
"Set first the lab PSU amp limit to max."
Already mentioned...

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: ok but max is 20A

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: Pssible c7374?

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message: it works. Thanks for all the valuable advice you were very kind

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
You're welcome!

Remember, you can NOT adjust the injected current.
It depends by short resistance and voltage injected.
Setting current limit to max, will not block the PSU; doesn't mean the PSU will inject 20A.

threads.title: 8203787 won't turn on
threads.message:
ok
thanks again for the advice?
